Document.title: Resume Ilya Nikishin
Document.description: Resume Ilya Nikishin - Senior Frontend Developer

Sber.title: Sberbank
Sber.description:
Developed the SberBusiness project with over a million users.
Leaded frontend development in my team, taught and mentored new developers.
Was a Scrum Master and helped to distribute the load on the team.
Organized and spoke at internal events for the frontend community.
Migrated the project to Webpack 5 and Module Federation, and optimized building and linting, which resulted in a 3x speedup on a cold build and a 2x speedup on a rebuild.

NTC.title: Scientific Technical Center «Industrial Safety»
NTC.description:
Maintained the company's existing services and websites, as well as created new ones.
Developed an internal requests service for employees.
Added integration with Active Directory.
Modernized the technical stack and addressed performance issues with slow running apps.
Set up and maintained company web servers.

RGA.title: Russian go-club association
RGA.description:
Developed web and mobile systems for the projects «Russian Go-club Association» and «Starykh Gallery».
Developed a custom CI/CD tool to manage app builds and releases. 
Redesigned the authorization system, eliminating a critical vulnerability.
Set up and maintain the company's server and SaaS services.
Developed an interactive art gallery in virtual reality.

About.title: About myself
About.content: I started as a backend developer, moved to full-stack, and later focused on frontend development. While working, I realized that I am good at organizing tasks in a team, as well as teaching people development. In development, I'm interested in new approaches to web application architecture. I am currently learning new generation frameworks like Astro and Solid.js.
